SELECT t.org_id, (select x.org_name from sys_authz_org_list x where x.org_id = t.org_id) as org_name, t.dept_id, t.dept_code, t.dept_name, t.dept_intro, t.dept_parent, t.dept_uid, t.dept_status, t.time24 FROM sys_authz_org_dept t
and t.org_id = #{model.orgId}
and t.dept_name like CONCAT('%',#{model.name},'%')
ORDER By t.time24 ASC

SELECT t.org_id, (select x.org_name from sys_authz_org_list x where x.org_id = t.org_id) as org_name, t.dept_id, t.dept_code, t.dept_name, t.dept_intro, t.dept_parent, t.dept_uid, t.dept_status, t.time24 FROM sys_authz_org_dept t WHERE t.dept_id = #{id}

SELECT t.org_id, (select x.org_name from sys_authz_org_list x where x.org_id = t.org_id) as org_name, t.dept_id, t.dept_code, t.dept_name, t.dept_intro, t.dept_parent, t.dept_uid, t.dept_status, t.time24 FROM sys_authz_org_dept t
WHERE t.dept_id = #{key,jdbcType=INTEGER}
